name: Gluttonous
ability: You, or both of your neighbours, might be malfunctioning.

name: Empathic
description: “Give them your attention, listen to them, but most importantly, care.”
ability: Each night, you learn your neighbour’s characteristics.
additional: If the Empathic character is malfunctioning, then they might be given false information.

name: Telepathic
description: “An open mind is like a fortress with its gates unbarred and unguarded.”
ability: Each night, you may choose a player (not yourself): you learn one Loyalist role and one Subversive role, one of which they are.
additional: If the Telepathic character is malfunctioning, then they might be given false information.

name: Clairvoyant
description: “Open your eyes, and see where you are not.”
ability: Each night, you may choose a player (not yourself): you learn if they performed an ability on another player during that night and who their target was.
additional: The Clairvoyant character does not learn the specific ability that is used by their target.
If the Clairvoyant character is malfunctioning, then they might be given false information.

name: Kind
ability: Once per game, during the night, you may choose a player: they learn your characteristic.

name: Slothful
ability: Once per game, during the night, if you would wake up due to your ability, you might not.

name: Prideful
ability: Each night*, if you were obsessed about being Prideful during the previous day, you might die.
additional: The Prideful character can not use their ability on the first night.

name: Wrathful
ability: Once per game, during the night*, one of your neighbours might die.
additional: The Wrathful character can not use their ability on the first night.

name: Greedy
ability: Your votes count for double, and all votes against you count for double.

name: Patient
ability: Every day that you do not vote, increases the count of your vote by one.
additional: If the Patient character is injured, then their days not voted resets to zero.

name: Charitable
ability: If you do not vote, your neighbours votes count for double.

name: Chaste
ability: You can not change role, team, or characteristic.

name: Humble
description: “I am all I am, nothing more and nothing less.”
ability: You can not be obsessed, and will not suffer the consequences of any of your obsessions.

name: Lustful
ability: Each night, you might join the team of a neighbour, or they might join your team.

name: Alcoholic
description: “I think it’s time you admitted it.”
ability: You do not know you are Alcoholic. You think you have a not in play characteristic, but you do not.
additional: If the Alcoholic character is injured, then they learn that they’re Alcoholic.
